p:
Similar to the SARS-CoV, symptoms of COVID-19 infection at onset of the illness include fever, myalgia, fatigue, and cough, and more than half of patients developed dyspnoea. Some patients had radiographic ground-glass lung alterations, and lower than average circulating lymphocyte and platelet populations. To date, the global deaths reached 5746, and the fatality rate was estimated as 3.7% for COVID-19 virus ( https://experience.arcgis.com/experience/685d0ace521648f8a5beeeee1b9125cd), which is lower than that of SARS-CoV (10%) or MERS-CoV (37%).
1 The major challenge of the coronavirus family and similar infectious agents is that no effective drugs or vaccine are available, and it may take many months for research and development.
